verses.verse: I Exhort <WG3870> Therefore, <WG3767> First <WG4412> Of All, <WG3956> To Be Made <WG4160> Supplications, <WG1162> Prayers, <WG4335> Intercessions, <WG1783> Thanksgivings, <WG2169> For <WG5228> All <WG3956> Men; <WG444>

For <WG5228> Kings <WG935> And <WG2532> All <WG3956> That <WG3588> In <WG1722> Dignity <WG5247> Are, <WG5607> That <WG2443> A Tranquil <WG2263> And <WG2532> Quiet <WG2272> Life <WG979> We May Lead <WG1236> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> Piety <WG2150> And <WG2532> Gravity; <WG4587>
<WG5124> For This <WG1063> Is Good <WG2570> And <WG2532> Acceptable <WG587> Before <WG1799> <WG3588> <WG4990> Our Saviour <WG2257> God, <WG2316>
Who <WG3739> All <WG3956> Men <WG444> Wishes <WG2309> To Be Saved <WG4982> And <WG2532> To <WG1519> Knowledge <WG1922> Of The Truth <WG225> To Come. <WG2064>
<WG1520> For One <WG1063> God Is, <WG2316> <WG1520> And One <WG2532> The Mediator <WG3316> Of God <WG2316> And <WG2532> Men, <WG444> The Man <WG444> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424>
Who <WG3588> Gave <WG1325> Himself <WG1438> A Ransom <WG487> For <WG5228> All, <WG3956> The <WG3588> Testimony To Be Rendered <WG3142> In Times <WG2540> Its Own, <WG2398>

To <WG1519> Which <WG3739> Was Appointed <WG5087> I 1473 P-1NS A Herald 2783 N-NSM And 2532 CONJ Apostle, The 652 N-NSM Truth 225 N-ASF I Speak 3004 V-PAI-1S In 1722 PREP, Christ, 5547 N-DSM Not 3756 PRT-N I Do Lie, 5574 V-PNI-1S A Teacher 1320 N-NSM Of The Nations, 1484 N-GPN In 1722 PREP Faith 4102 N-DSF And 2532 CONJ Truth. 225 N-DSF

I Will <WG1014> Therefore <WG3767> To Pray <WG4336> The <WG3588> Men <WG435> In <WG1722> Every <WG3956> Place, <WG5117> Lifting Up <WG1869> Holy <WG3741> Hands <WG5495> Apart From <WG5565> Wrath <WG3709> And <WG2532> Reasoning. <WG1261>

In Like Manner <WG5615> Also <WG2532> The <WG3588> Women <WG1135> In <WG1722> Guise <WG2689> Seemly <WG2887> With <WG3326> Modesty <WG127> And <WG2532> Discreetness <WG4997> To Adorn <WG2885> Themselves, <WG1438> Not <WG3361> With <WG1722> Plaitings, <WG4117> Or <WG2228> , Gold, <WG5557> Or <WG2228> Pearls, <WG3135> Or <WG2228> Clothing <WG2441> Costly, <WG4185>
' But <WG235> What <WG3739> Is Becoming <WG4241> To Women <WG1135> Professing <WG1861> The Fear Of God, <WG2317> ' By <WG1223> Works <WG2041> Good. <WG18>
A Woman <WG1135> In <WG1722> Quietness <WG2271> Let Learn <WG3129> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> Subjection; <WG5292>

<WG1135> But A Woman <WG1161> To Teach <WG1321> <WG3756> I Do Not Allow, <WG2010> Nor To <WG3761> Exercise Authority Over <WG831> Man, <WG435> ' But <WG235> To Be <WG1511> In <WG1722> Quietness; <WG2271>
<WG76> For Adam <WG1063> First <WG4413> Was Formed, <WG4111> Then <WG1534> Eve : <WG2096>
And <WG2532> Adam <WG76> <WG3756> Was Not Deceived; <WG538> <WG3588> But The <WG1161> Woman, <WG1135> Having Been Deceived, <WG538> In <WG1722> Transgression <WG3847> Has Become. <WG1096>

<WG4982> But She Shall Be Saved <WG1161> Through <WG1223> The <WG3588> Childbearing, <WG5042> If <WG1437> They Abide <WG3306> In <WG1722> Faith <WG4102> And <WG2532> Love <WG26> And <WG2532> Sanctification <WG38> With <WG3326> Discreetness. <WG4997>
